rules_text:
This creature can't be blocked by more than one creature.
[i]Augmented[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, put a number of +1/+1 counters on target creature equal to this creature's power.
[i](This token's mana cost is {4}{G}.)[/i]
